function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Biased risk perception due to uncertainty about covid-19","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited understanding of the new disease covid-19","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge about covid-19 symptoms and transmission","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Downplaying the risk of contagious diseases","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorrect risk perception leading to lack of preventative actions","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changes in human behavior occur in three stages: knowledge acquisition, belief generation, and behavior formation","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of appropriate knowledge as a prerequisite for the public to take action","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 outbreak and its impact on global healthcare systems","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Home isolation and pop-up quarantine facilities for covid-19 patients","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dispersed nature of cases and infected individuals","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High contagiousness of sars-cov-2","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance with state regulations for air duct cleaners","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding and guidance on ventilation systems in the context of covid-19 and infectious disease outbreaks","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on ventilation in nonmedical settings","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of specific guidance on proper ventilation rates in nonmedical settings for reducing infection transmission","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Expensive cost of copper material and maintenance","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential exposure to harmful chemical disinfectants and sanitizers","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High maintenance costs of copper materials.","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of contactless systems","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of safe physical distancing","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of ’contactless pathways’ to reduce covid-19 disease transmission","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High reliance on contactless systems may lead to a false sense of security and neglect of other important infection control measures, contributing to increased transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conversion of existing buildings into emergency centers raises potential health and safety risks","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Heavy reliance on buildings for livelihood activities during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provocations of right-wing parties calling for a ’return to normality’ and stopping npis","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overlooking the immediate health and well-being benefits of npis","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low public compliance with mitigation measures","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Social identity affecting compliance with public health advice","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Public non-compliance with mitigation measures","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures across states","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low compliance with mitigation policies","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistent mitigation policies and responses","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of clear guidelines for safe occupancy numbers in indoor spaces","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of data on the effectiveness of uv-c inactivating sars-cov-2, which may lead to uncertainty in the selection of appropriate control measures for the virus.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of recognition of ventilation as a critical method for reducing airborne transmission","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of direct confirmatory evidence of self-inoculation into mucous membranes as the end-stage pathway to infection through droplet and contact transmission routes.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incongruity in the level of evidence required to demonstrate airborne transmission compared to other transmission modes.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Operators mutate the components of a chromosome, generating new chromosomes, which may introduce new genetic defects.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Selection of mutation operators is done randomly with equal probability, leading to unpredictable and potentially suboptimal outcomes.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Iterative process continues until stopping conditions are met, potentially leading to long computation times and resource utilization.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Evaluation of solutions based on cost functions may not account for contagious disease propagation risk.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Accumulation of answers at a single point of space may lead to localized outbreaks of contagious diseases.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Random selection of chromosomes from the main population may lead to the propagation of genetic factors related to susceptibility to contagious diseases.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on industries and economies","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Need for comprehensive study of covid-19","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of community engagement in public health strategies","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of inclusive communication channels and languages for vulnerable populations","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of access to mental health services and support for vulnerable populations","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Onset of symptoms of stress and psychiatric disorders affecting the immune system","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Social isolation in nursing homes during confinement","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
